articles.author: Satoshi Sugiyama
articles.title: Japan Q4 GDP revised up to slight expansion, economy avoids recession - Reuters
articles.description: Japan's economy avoided a technical recession, revised government data showed on Monday, even though the upward change in the fourth quarter was weaker than expected and highlighted concerns about the sluggish economic recovery.
